description: Travel advice for works on London Bridge including closure to traffic

texts: {"template":"intro","texts":["London Bridge is closed in both directions to all traffic except buses, licensed taxis and cyclists."],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
The City of London is carrying out essential maintenance works to London Bridge .
Until the end of October 2020 London Bridge will be closed in both directions to all traffic except buses, licensed taxis and cyclists.
There are diversions over Tower Bridge and Blackfriars Bridge. These river crossings are extremely busy - seek alternative routes across the river if possible.
You will still be able to walk across the bridge throughout the works, but there is less space than usual as we need need to close one pavement until early August.
Check Status updates for roads around London Bridge.

{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"Freight"}

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Only vehicles less than 18 tonnes are permitted to use Tower Bridge","If you are running haulage trips through the area, consider re routing to avoid delays and disruption"]}
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"Tour buses and coach drivers"}
{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Tour buses and coaches are able to use London Bridge as usual throughout the works - journey times will be longer"]}
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Cycling"}

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["You can to cycle across London Bridge as usual throughout the works","There is only one lane open in each direction","You may have a better journey if you use a different route such as Southwark Bridge or travel outside the busiest times"]}
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Buses"}

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Buses are still be able to travel across London Bridge","They don't pick up or drop off passengers on the bridge itself","The northbound (Q, M) and southbound (P,Y) bus stops at either end of the bridge are closed"]}
Check Status updates for buses.
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Other ways of travelling"}
The closure does not affect the Tube, London Overground, TfL Rail or the DLR.
Check Status updates for the Tube, London Overground TfL Rail, the DLR and trams.
